publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 57
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa tašḥet́ üśt́uńa David́niń abajly miźmor qačḥanynda alnyndan Šaulnun pečoraɣa. Ḥajyfsunɣun ḿeni e Teńri ḥajyfsunɣun ki saja išanadyr ǯanym da ḱoĺaǵasińd́a hašɣaḥajnyn syjynamyn ńegińč́a ašḥej qavšar kiši.
Čaɣyramyn joɣarɣy Teńriǵa jaḥšy t́oĺav́č́uǵa telejdi maja.
Ijar bijik ḱoḱt́ań da jarlyɣašlar ḿeni da qutḥaryr ḿeni rusvaj et́ḱanińd́ań ovuvčumnun hamḿeš́a ijar Teńri ševaɣatyn da kertiligiń.

Ǯanym ortasynda tiši aryslan- larnyn toḥtejdyr jalynuvčularnyn adam ulanlarynyn tiš́ĺari alarnyn
śuńǵu da oḥlar da tiĺĺari biĺaǵań qylyč kibik.
Bijikligijni ḱorǵuź- ǵuń ol ḱoḱĺar üśt́uńa e Teńri bar ol jer üśt́uńa syjyj śeniń.
Av t́uźud́uĺar atlamlaryma b́uŕaĺdi ǯanym qazdy- lar alnymda ǯuɣur t́uš́t́uĺar ortasyna anyn hamḿeš́a.
T́uźu- ǵuń juŕagimni e Teńri t́uźuǵuń juŕagimni šira oḥurmyn da zemer oḥurmyn saja.
Ojanɣyn syjly ǯanym ojanɣyn ol qyǯaḥ da qobuz ojatamyn šaḥar julduzun.
Maḥtav b́erajim uluslar arasyna e H zemer oḥurmyn saja ummalar arasyna.
Ki ulɣajadyr ḱoḱĺarǵa dejiń ševaɣatyj da qatlaryna dejiń ḱoḱĺarniń kertiligij.
Bijikligijni ḱorǵuźǵuń ḱoḱĺar üśt́uńa e Teńri bar ol jer üśt́uńa syjyj śeniń.

app.note: It is a word of Hebrew origin and occurs in Psalm titles, it is probably the part of the opening words to a popular song (516 in Strong’s Exhaustive Concordance of the Bible).
